app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Tutor Lily AI Language Tutor
app_description: Struggling to learn a new language Become fluent now by having engaging real life conversations with a friendly AI companion powered by ChatGPT! With Tutor Lily you can practice speaking a new language at your own pace wherever and whenever you want. Tutor Lily currently supports all the following languages: English Spanish French German Italian Portuguese Japanese Korean Chinese Arabic Dutch Russian Turkish Ukrainian Greek Polish Swedish Hindi and more coming soon! Key Features include: Personalized AI Conversations: Tutor Lily adapts to your learning needs engaging you in meaningful interactive conversations to help you practice your way to fluency. Instant Corrections Explanations: Tutor Lily automatically highlights and corrects your mistakes. Click on Explain Mistakes to receive detailed explanations for every single mistake. In app Translations: Stuck on a word or phrase Use the Translate feature to translate Lily s responses in your native language making it easier to grasp new concepts and vocabulary. You can also say some words in your native language and let Lily translate them for you. Voice Recognition Pronunciation: Use our Speech to text feature to speak to Tutor Lily with your own voice and ensure that your pronunciation is on point. Listening Comprehension: Click on Read Aloud to listen to Tutor Lily s responses and perfect your listening skills. So why choose Tutor Lily ... Focus on Fluency: Our app is designed to help you become fluent in your target language through engaging interactive and immersive conversations with Tutor Lily. Experience language learning like never before! Fast Efficient Learning: Tutor Lily s real time feedback explanations and personalized approach allow you to learn more effectively saving time and accelerating your progress. Expert AI Tutor: Leveraging state of the art ChatGPT and GPT 4 algorithms Tutor Lily provides a language learning experience that rivals traditional tutoring making it easier and more accessible for everyone. Privacy Security: We value your privacy and ensure that all user data is protected and secure. Continuous Improvement: We are dedicated to enhancing Tutor Lily with new features languages and improvements based on user feedback and Generative AI innovations. Download Tutor Lily now and embark on your language learning journey with your friendly AI companion. Experience a new way to learn languages gain confidence in your speaking and writing abilities and unlock your potential! Your feedback is important to us! If you have any suggestions questions or issues please contact us at support tutorlily.com. We are always here to help and continuously improve Tutor Lily for a better language learning experience. Don t wait any longer. Join the Tutor Lily community and start mastering a new language today!
